name: Icejade Creation Kingfisher
effectText: You can target 1 WATER monster you control; equip this card from your hand or field to it. An "Icejade" monster equipped with this card can attack while in Defense Position. If it does, apply its DEF for damage calculation. While this card is equipped to a monster: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls with ATK less than or equal to the equipped monster's DEF; Special Summon this card, and if you do, return that targeted monster to the hand. You can only use this effect of "Icejade Creation Kingfisher" once per turn.
